title: The manner of making of coffee, tea, and chocolate as it is used in most parts of Europe, Asia, Africa, and America, with their vertues / newly done out of French and Spanish.
author: Dufour, Philippe Sylvestre, 1622-1687.
notes: The tracts on tea and on chocolate have special title pages.  Those on tea and coffee are translated by John Chamberlayne from the French of Philippe Sylvestre Dufour; that on chocolate from the Spanish of A. Colmenero de Ledesma. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
